00149     public function GetAgentAnimationAsSpriteFrame() {
00150         $animationFile = $this->GetAgentAnimationFile();
00151         if($animationFile == '') {
00152             $animationFile = $this->GetAgentAnimationGallery();
00153             if($animationFile == '') {
00154                 throw new Exception('No animation file!');
00155             }
00156             $animationFile .= '.c16';
00157         }
00158         $animationFirstImage = $this->GetAgentAnimationFirstImage();
00159         $animationString = $this->GetAgentAnimationString();
00160         if($animationFirstImage == '') {
00161             $animationFirstImage = 0;
00162         }
00163         if($animationString == '') {
00164             $animationString = 0;
00165         }
00166         if(($position = strpos($animationString,' ')) !== false) {
00167             $animationString = substr($animationString,0,$position);
00168         }
00169         $prayfile = $this->GetPrayFile();
00170         if($prayfile == null) {
00171             throw new Exception('No PRAY file to get the icon from!');
00172         }
00173         $iconBlock = $prayfile->GetBlockByName($animationFile);
00174         if($iconBlock->GetType() != 'FILE') {
00175             throw new Exception('The block with the animation\'s filename is not a file block!');
00176         }
00177         $type = strtolower(substr($animationFile,-3));
00178         $icon = null;
00179         print $type;
00180         if($type == 'c16') {
00181             $icon = new C16File(new StringReader($iconBlock->GetData()));
00182         } else if($type == 's16') {
00183             $icon = new S16File(new StringReader($iconBlock->GetData()));
00184         }
00185         if($icon == null) {
00186             throw new Exception('For one reason or another, couldn\'t make a sprite file for the agent.');
00187         }
00188         return $icon->GetFrame($animationFirstImage+$animationString);
00189     }
